import React from 'react'; import classNames from "classnames/bind" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import style from './Header.scss' import Logo_Apple from '../../../image/Logo_Apple.png' import Logo_topzone from '../../../image/logo_topzone.png' const cx = classNames.bind(style) const tab=[ {path:'/iphone',title:"iPhone"}, {path:'/mac',title:"Mac"}, {path:'/ipad',title:"iPad"}, {path:'/watch',title:"Watch"}, {path:'/am-thanh',title:"Âm thanh"}, {path:'/phu-kien',title:"Phụ kiện"}, {path:'/tekzone',title:"TekZone"}, {path:'/topcare',title:"TopCare"}, ] const Header = () => { return (
    { tab.map((e,index)=>(
  • {e.title}
    • )) }
); } export default Header;
